articles.title: 4 Weird Things You Can Turn into a Supercapacitor
articles.summary: What do water bottles, eggs, hemp, and cement have in common? articles.title: Jill Gostin Is 2026 IEEE President-Elect
articles.summary: IEEE Senior Member Jill I. Gostin has been elected as the 2026 IEEE president-elect. She will begin serving as president on 1 January 2027.
